dcterms:description: A corpus consisting of 15,689 Song iambics, covering most of the Song iambics that have come down through the years, with 15,001 used for training and 688 for testing.
dcterms:title: Song iambics corpus (Songci)

dcterms:description: A large corpus containing roughly 1.12 billion Chinese characters, used for training the word embedding model.
dcterms:title: Gigaword corpus

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 11,099 quatrains and 62,566 other regulated verses, used to train the statistical machine translation model.
dcterms:title: Quatrains and other regulated verses

dcterms:description: A corpus used for training the word embedding model, consisting of approximately 1.22 million Chinese characters.
dcterms:title: Songci corpus (used for word embedding)
